title: On Being Distracted

summary:
Interesting analysis: An Internet Voting System Fatally Flawed in Creative New Ways. 
Abstract: The recently published “MERGE” protocol is designed to be used in the prototype CAC-vote system.  The voting kiosk and protocol transmit votes over the internet and then transmit voter-verifiable paper ballots through the mail...
title: Security Analysis of the MERGE Voting Protocol
